description.value:
Normalises gravity when upon them to that of Holy Terra (1G). Alternatively can create much higher or lower gravity as required. Uses include securing cargo, creating high-G restraining cells, and so on.

Requirements

Look like huge squares of metal that can be laid out.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
